Test Title: AT-TC-001: Verify Register page loads correctly
Pre-condition: User is on the registration page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the registration page.
2. Fill in all required fields with valid data.
3. Click the 'Register' button.
Expected Result: User is redirected to the login page or a success message is displayed.

Test Title: AT-TC-002: Verify registration with existing email fails
Pre-condition: User is on the registration page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the registration page.
2. Fill in the registration form with an email that is already registered.
3. Click the 'Register' button.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed indicating that the email is already in use.

Test Title: AT-TC-003: Verify registration with invalid email fails
Pre-condition: User is on the registration page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the registration page.
2. Enter an invalid email format in the email field.
3. Fill in other required fields.
4. Click the 'Register' button.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed for the invalid email format.

Test Title: AT-TC-004: Verify registration with mismatched passwords fails
Pre-condition: User is on the registration page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the registration page.
2. Fill in the registration form.
3. Enter a different password in the 'confirm password' field.
4. Click the 'Register' button.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed indicating that the passwords do not match.

Test Title: AT-TC-005: Verify registration functionality
Pre-condition: User is on the registration page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the registration page.
2. Fill in the registration form with a password of 5 characters.
3. Click the 'Register' button.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed for invalid password length.

Test Title: AT-TC-006: Verify registration functionality
Pre-condition: User is on the registration page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the registration page.
2. Fill in the registration form with a password that does not contain numbers.
3. Click the 'Register' button.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed indicating that the password must contain at least one number.

Test Title: AT-TC-007: Verify registration functionality
Pre-condition: User is on the registration page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the registration page.
2. Fill in the registration form with a password that does not contain letters.
3. Click the 'Register' button.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed indicating that the password must contain at least one letter.

Test Title: AT-TC-008: Verify registration functionality
Pre-condition: User has a valid account.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter a valid registered email and password.
3. Click the 'Login' button.
Expected Result: User is redirected to the home page or their dashboard.

Test Title: AT-TC-009: Verify registration functionality
Pre-condition: User has a valid account.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter a valid registered email and an incorrect password.
3. Click the 'Login' button.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed for invalid credentials.

Test Title: AT-TC-010: Verify registration functionality
Pre-condition: User is on the login page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter an email that is not registered.
3. Enter a password.
4. Click the 'Login' button.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed for invalid credentials.

Test Title: AT-TC-011: Verify login with empty email field fails
Pre-condition: User is on the login page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Leave the email field empty.
3. Enter a valid password.
4. Click the 'Login' button.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed for the empty email field.

Test Title: AT-TC-012: Verify login with empty password field fails
Pre-condition: User is on the login page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter a valid email.
3. Leave the password field empty.
4. Click the 'Login' button.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed for the empty password field.

Test Title: AT-TC-013: Verify login with empty email field fails
Pre-condition: User is on the login page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Leave both email and password fields empty.
3. Click the 'Login' button.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed for empty credentials.

Test Title: AT-TC-014: Verify login functionality
Pre-condition: User is on the login page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter a valid email.
3. Enter a password with 5 characters.
4. Click the 'Login' button.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed for invalid password length.

Test Title: AT-TC-015: Verify login functionality
Pre-condition: User is on the login page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter a valid email.
3. Enter a password with 6 characters.
4. Click the 'Login' button.
Expected Result: User is redirected to the home page or their dashboard.

Test Title: AT-TC-016: Verify login functionality
Pre-condition: User is on the login page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter a valid email.
3. Enter a password with 20 characters.
4. Click the 'Login' button.
Expected Result: User is redirected to the home page or their dashboard.

Test Title: AT-TC-017: Verify login functionality
Pre-condition: User is on the login page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter a valid email.
3. Enter a password with 21 characters.
4. Click the 'Login' button.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed for invalid password length.

Test Title: AT-TC-018: Verify successful user logout
Pre-condition: User is logged in.
Test Steps:
1. Log in to the application.
2. Click on the 'Logout' button.
Expected Result: User is logged out and redirected to the home page.

Test Title: PT-TC-001: View products list
Pre-condition: N/A
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to the products page.
Expected Result: A list of products is displayed, each with a name, image, and price.

Test Title: PT-TC-002: View product details
Pre-condition: Products are available.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the products page.
2. Click on a product.
Expected Result: The user is redirected to the product detail page, showing more information about the product.

Test Title: PT-TC-003: 1. Use the search bar to search for a product.
Pre-condition: Products are available.
Test Steps: 1. Use the search bar to search for a product.
Expected Result: Products matching the search term are displayed.

Test Title: PT-TC-004: 1. Use the search bar to search for a product that does not exist.
Pre-condition: Products are available.
Test Steps: 1. Use the search bar to search for a product that does not exist.
Expected Result: A message indicating 'No products found' is displayed.

Test Title: PT-TC-005: Verify product filter functionality
Pre-condition: Products are available.
Test Steps: 1. On the products page, select a category from the filter options.
Expected Result: Only products belonging to the selected category are displayed.

Test Title: PT-TC-006: Verify product filter functionality
Pre-condition: Products are available.
Test Steps: 1. On the products page, set a price range in the filter options.
Expected Result: Only products within the selected price range are displayed.

Test Title: PT-TC-007: Verify product pagination
Pre-condition: Products are displayed across multiple pages.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the products page.
2. Click on a page number in the pagination control.
Expected Result: The corresponding page of products is displayed.

Test Title: PT-TC-008: 1. Navigate to a product page.
Pre-condition: User is logged in and is on a product page.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to a product page.
2. Click the 'Like' button.
Expected Result: The like count for the product increases.

Test Title: PT-TC-009: 1. Like a product.
Pre-condition: User has liked a product.
Test Steps:
1. Like a product.
2. Click the 'Unlike' button.
Expected Result: The like count for the product decreases.

Test Title: CT-TC-001: Verify guest can't access cart page
Pre-condition: User is not logged in
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to /web/cart
Expected Result: See alert message 'Please login to continue' or similar login requirement message

Test Title: CT-TC-002: Verify  users can add products to cart
Pre-condition: User is logged in and navigates to cart
Test Steps: 1. Click 'Add to Cart' button for any product
Expected Result: See 'Added to cart!' alert and cart badge increment

Test Title: CT-TC-003: Verify logged-in user can see empty cart state
Pre-condition: User is logged in and navigates to cart
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to /web/cart
Expected Result: See 'Your cart is empty' label, Total: $0.00, Subtotal: $0.00, and available buttons

Test Title: CT-TC-004: Verify logged-in user can add products and see them in cart
Pre-condition: User is logged in
Test Steps: 1. Go to products page 2. Add product to cart 3. Navigate to cart
Expected Result: See product in cart with name, price, quantity, item total and correct calculations

Test Title: CT-TC-005: Verify user can increase item quantity and calculations update
Pre-condition: User has items in cart
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to cart 2. Click '+' button for an item
Expected Result: Item quantity increases, item total recalculates, cart subtotal and total update

Test Title: CT-TC-006: Verify user can decrease item quantity and calculations update
Pre-condition: User has items in cart with quantity > 1
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to cart 2. Click '-' button for an item
Expected Result: Item quantity decreases, item total recalculates, cart subtotal and total update

Test Title: CT-TC-007: Verify user can set specific quantity and calculations update
Pre-condition: User has items in cart
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to cart 2. Enter specific quantity in quantity input
Expected Result: Item quantity updates, item total recalculates, cart subtotal and total update

Test Title: CT-TC-008: Verify user can remove individual items from cart
Pre-condition: User has multiple items in cart
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to cart 2. Click 'Remove' button for an item
Expected Result: Selected item disappears, cart badge and calculations update accordingly

Test Title: CT-TC-009: Verify user can clear all items from cart
Pre-condition: User has items in cart
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to cart 2. Click 'Clear Cart' button
Expected Result: Cart becomes empty with appropriate empty state messages

Test Title: CT-TC-010: Verify all monetary values follow $XX.XX format
Pre-condition: User has items in cart
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to cart 2. Observe all prices and totals
Expected Result: All prices, item totals, subtotal and total follow $XX.XX format with 2 decimal places

Test Title: CT-TC-011: Verify checkout process works when cart has items
Pre-condition: User has items in cart and is logged in
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to cart 2. Click 'Proceed to Checkout' button
Expected Result: Shipping address field accepts and retains the entered address

Test Title: CT-TC-012: Verify user can't checkout with empty shipping address
Pre-condition: User is on checkout page
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to cart 2. Click 'Proceed to Checkout' button 4. Enter empty address
Expected Result: user can't checkout with empty address

Test Title: CT-TC-013: Verify system handles invalid zero quantities
Pre-condition: User has items in cart
Test Steps: 1. Enter invalid quantity (0)
Expected Result: System handles invalid input and remove item from cart

Test Title: CT-TC-014: Verify system handles invalid -5 negative quantities
Pre-condition: User has items in cart
Test Steps: 1. Enter invalid quantity (-5)
Expected Result: System handles invalid input and remove item from cart

Test Title: CT-TC-015: Verify system handles invalid 999999 quantities
Pre-condition: User has items in cart
Test Steps: 1. Add to cart 2, Navigate to cart 3. make quantity to 99999 4. checkout with valid address
Expected Result: alert message appears insufficient stock

Test Title: CT-TC-016: Verify cart state persists after navigation
Pre-condition: User has items in cart
Test Steps: 1. Navigate away from cart 2. Return to cart
Expected Result: Cart contents and calculations remain unchanged after navigation

Test Title: CT-TC-005: Verifiy product checkout
Pre-condition: User has items in the cart.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the cart page.
2. Click the 'Checkout' button.
Expected Result: The user is redirected to the order page.

Test Title: OT-TC-002: 1. Proceed to the checkout page.
Pre-condition: User is on the checkout page.
Test Steps:
1. Proceed to the checkout page.
2. Fill in the shipping address form with valid data.
3. Click the 'Place Order' button.
Expected Result: An order confirmation message is displayed, and the order appears in the user's order history.

Test Title: OT-TC-003: 1. Proceed to the checkout page.
Pre-condition: User is on the checkout page.
Test Steps:
1. Proceed to the checkout page.
2. Leave the shipping address fields empty.
3. Click the 'Place Order' button.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed, prompting the user to fill in the shipping address.

Test Title: OT-TC-004: 1. Log in and navigate to the 'My Orders' page.
Pre-condition: User is logged in and has placed orders.
Test Steps: 1. Log in and navigate to the 'My Orders' page.
Expected Result: A list of the user's past orders is displayed.

Test Title: OT-TC-005: 1. Navigate to the 'My Orders' page.
Pre-condition: User has placed orders with different statuses.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the 'My Orders' page.
2. Click on a status filter (e.g., 'Pending').
Expected Result: Only orders with the selected status are displayed.

Test Title: OT-TC-006: 1. Place an order and ensure it is in 'pending' status.
Pre-condition: User has a pending order.
Test Steps:
1. Place an order and ensure it is in 'pending' status.
2. Navigate to the 'My Orders' page.
3. Click the 'Cancel Order' button for the pending order.
Expected Result: ,The order status changes to 'cancelled'.

Test Title: OT-TC-007: 1. On a product page, click the 'Buy Now' button.
Pre-condition: User is on a product page.
Test Steps: 1. On a product page, click the 'Buy Now' button.
Expected Result: The user is taken directly to the checkout page with the item in their cart.

Test Title: AST-TC-001: Complete Advanced Search Form
Pre-condition: N/A
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the advanced search page.
2. Enter search criteria.
3. Click the 'Search' button.
Expected Result: Products matching the criteria are displayed.

Test Title: AST-TC-002: Clear Advanced Search Form
Pre-condition: N/A
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the advanced search page.
2. Enter search criteria.
3. Click the 'Search' button.
4. Click 'Clear' button
Expected Result: Products  should clear.
